item.description: I’m an Open Source advocate, Red Hat Certified Engineer, Linux SysAdmin, amateur photographer, n00b runner, piano and music enthusiast. I’m currently working as a Systems Engineer for Pythian. Solange’s husband and Josue’s dad.
